name: Potion Brawl
description:
Potion Brawl is a two player versus game where you have to smash your opponent out of the screen to win. You are two mighty wizards fighting with exploding potions ! Be quick, dodge and kick through an epic battle for magic domination !

This game has been created by seven students during a 20 hours jam. You will need two gamepads to play.

Credits : 
Game Art :
Émélie Philippe
Morganne Michot
Game Design :
